from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType
from datetime import datetime
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql import Window
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, TimestampType, StringType

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, trim, regexp_replace

%%sql

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr (
    PersNo                  STRING,
    Firstname               STRING,
    Lastname                STRING,
    EmployeeNo              STRING,
    CoCd                    STRING,
    CompanyCode             STRING,
    PA                      STRING,
    PersonnelArea           STRING,
    PSubarea                STRING,
    PersonnelSubarea        STRING,
    Orgunit                 STRING,
    OrganizationalUnit      STRING,
    Organizationalkey       STRING,
    OrganizationalKey1      STRING,
    WorkC                   STRING,
    WorkContract            STRING,
    CT                      STRING,
    ContractType            STRING,
    PSgroup                 STRING,
    PayBandDescription      STRING,
    FTE                     DOUBLE,
    Wkhrs                   DOUBLE,
    IndicatorPartTimeEmployee BOOLEAN,
    S                       STRING,
    EmploymentStatus        STRING,
    GenderKey               STRING,
    TRAStartDate            DATE,
    TRAEndDate              DATE,
    TRAStatus               STRING,
    TRAGrade                STRING,
    PrevPersNo              STRING,
    ActR                    STRING,
    ReasonforAction         STRING,
    Position                STRING,
    Position1               STRING,
    CostCtr                 STRING,
    CostCentre              STRING,
    CivilServiceStart        DATE,
    DatetoCurrentJob        DATE,
    SeniorityDate           DATE,
    DatetoSubstGrade        DATE,
    PersNo1                 STRING,
    NameofManagerOM         STRING,
    ManagerPosition         STRING,
    ManagerPositionText     STRING,
    CounterSignManager      STRING,
    Loc                      STRING,
    Location                STRING,
    OrgStartDate            DATE,
    FixTermEndDate           DATE,
    LoanStartDate           DATE,
    LoanEndDate             DATE,
    EEGrp                   STRING,
    EmployeeGroup           STRING,
    Annualsalary            DOUBLE,
    Curr                    STRING,
    NInumber                STRING,
    Birthdate               DATE,
    Ageofemployee           INT,
    EO                      STRING,
    Ethnicorigin            STRING,
    NID                     STRING,
    Rel                     STRING,
    ReligiousDenominationKey STRING,
    SxO                     STRING,
    WageType                STRING,
    EmployeeSubgroup        STRING,
    LOAAbsType              STRING,
    LOAAbsenceTypeText      STRING,
    Schemereference         STRING,
    PensionSchemeName       STRING,
    DisabilityCode          STRING,
    DisabilityText          STRING,
    DisabilityCodeDescription STRING,
    PArea                   STRING,
    PayrollArea             STRING,
    AssignmentNumber        STRING,
    FTE2                    DOUBLE,
    Report_MonthEnd_Date    DATE,
    PDAC_ETL_Date            DATE
)
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://odw-harmonised@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/sap_hr';

%%pyspark


spark.sql("""
INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR
(
    PersNo,
    Firstname,
    Lastname,
    EmployeeNo,
    CoCd,
    CompanyCode,
    PA,
    PersonnelArea,
    PSubarea,
    PersonnelSubarea,
    Orgunit,
    OrganizationalUnit,
    Organizationalkey,
    OrganizationalKey1,
    WorkC,
    WorkContract,
    CT,
    ContractType,
    PSgroup,
    PayBandDescription,
    FTE,
    Wkhrs,
    IndicatorPartTimeEmployee,
    S,
    EmploymentStatus,
    GenderKey,
    TRAStartDate,
    TRAEndDate,
    TRAStatus,
    TRAGrade,
    PrevPersNo,
    ActR,
    ReasonforAction,
    Position,
    Position1,
    CostCtr,
    CostCentre,
    CivilServiceStart,
    DatetoCurrentJob,
    SeniorityDate,
    DatetoSubstGrade,
    PersNo1,
    NameofManagerOM,
    ManagerPosition,
    ManagerPositionText,
    CounterSignManager,
    Loc,
    Location,
    OrgStartDate,
    FixTermEndDate,
    LoanStartDate,
    LoanEndDate,
    EEGrp,
    EmployeeGroup,
    Annualsalary,
    Curr,
    NInumber,
    Birthdate,
    Ageofemployee,
    EO,
    Ethnicorigin,
    NID,
    Rel,
    ReligiousDenominationKey,
    SxO,
    WageType,
    EmployeeSubgroup,
    LOAAbsType,
    LOAAbsenceTypeText,
    Schemereference,
    PensionSchemeName,
    DisabilityCode,
    DisabilityText,
    DisabilityCodeDescription,
    PArea,
    PayrollArea,
    AssignmentNumber,
    FTE2,
    Report_MonthEnd_Date,
    PDAC_ETL_Date
)
SELECT
    PersNo,
    Firstname,
    Lastname,
    EmployeeNo,
    CoCd,
    CompanyCode,
    PA,
    PersonnelArea,
    PSubarea,
    PersonnelSubarea,
    Orgunit,
    OrganizationalUnit,
    Organizationalkey,
    OrganizationalKey1,
    WorkC,
    WorkContract,
    CT,
    ContractType,
    PSgroup,
    PayBandDescription,
    cast(FTE AS FLOAT),
    cast(Wkhrs AS FLOAT),
    cast(IndicatorPartTimeEmployee AS BOOLEAN),
    S,
    EmploymentStatus,
    GenderKey,
    try_cast(TRAStartDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(TRAEndDate AS DATE),
    TRAStatus,
    TRAGrade,
    PrevPersNo,
    ActR,
    ReasonforAction,
    Position,
    Position1,
    CostCtr,
    CostCentre,
    try_cast(CivilServiceStart AS DATE),
    try_cast(DatetoCurrentJob AS DATE),
    try_cast(SeniorityDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(DatetoSubstGrade AS DATE),
    PersNo1,
    NameofManagerOM,
    ManagerPosition,
    ManagerPositionText,
    CounterSignManager,
    Loc,
    Location,
    try_cast(OrgStartDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(FixTermEndDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(LoanStartDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(LoanEndDate AS DATE),
    EEGrp,
    EmployeeGroup,
    cast(Annualsalary AS DOUBLE),
    Curr,
    NULL AS NInumber,
    try_cast(Birthdate AS DATE),
    cast(Ageofemployee AS INT),
    EO,
    Ethnicorigin,
    NID,
    Rel,
    ReligiousDenominationKey,
    SxO,
    WageType,
    EmployeeSubgroup,
    LOAAbsType,
    LOAAbsenceTypeText,
    Schemereference,
    PensionSchemeName,
    DisabilityCode,
    DisabilityText,
    DisabilityCodeDescription,
    PArea,
    PayrollArea,
    AssignmentNumber,
    cast(FTE2 AS FLOAT),
    NULL AS Report_MonthEnd_Date,
    current_timestamp() AS PDAC_ETL_Date
FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_history_monthly

-- Step 1: Delete month-end data if already loaded, based on source file name
DELETE FROM odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR
WHERE Report_MonthEnd_Date IN (
    SELECT Report_MonthEnd_Date
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR
    GROUP BY Report_MonthEnd_Date
);

-- Step 2: Extract file date from the source file name
WITH FileDate AS (
    SELECT 
        to_date(substring(file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd') AS file_date
    FROM 
        odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement
    LIMIT 1
)

-- Step 3: Calculate staff cost
, StaffCost AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        h.PersNo AS staff_number,
        h.PSgroup AS grade,
        h.Annual_salary AS salary,
        CAST(h.Annualsalary AS DOUBLE) / (365.0 * 7.4) AS hourly_rate,
        CASE 
            WHEN datediff(le.Ded_from, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Ded_from
            ELSE date_add(le.Ded_from, -365)
        END AS leave_start_date,
        to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd') AS date_from_file_name,
        le.Number * ABS((datediff(
            CASE 
                WHEN datediff(le.Ded_from, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Ded_from
                ELSE date_add(le.Ded_from, -365)
            END,
            to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
        ) / 364.25) % 1) AS expected_leave_taken_hrs,
        le.Number * (1 - ABS((datediff(
            CASE 
                WHEN datediff(le.Ded_from, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Ded_from
                ELSE date_add(le.Ded_from, -365)
            END,
            to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
        ) / 364.25) % 1)) AS expected_leave_hours_remaining,
        le.Number AS leave_allowance,
        ABS((datediff(
            CASE 
                WHEN datediff(le.Ded_from, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Ded_from
                ELSE date_add(le.Ded_from, -365)
            END,
            to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
        ) / 364.25) % 1) AS percent_leave_year_passed,
        (1 - ABS((datediff(
            CASE 
                WHEN datediff(le.Ded_from, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Ded_from
                ELSE date_add(le.Ded_from, -365)
            END,
            to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
        ) / 364.25) % 1)) AS percent_leave_year_remaining,
        h.Contract_Type
    FROM 
        odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR h
    LEFT JOIN 
        odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement le 
    ON 
        h.PersNo = CASE 
            WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.Staff_Number AS STRING), 1) = '4' THEN CONCAT('50', le.Staff_Number)
            WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.Staff_Number AS STRING), 1) = '5' THEN CONCAT('00', le.Staff_Number)
            ELSE CAST(le.Staff_Number AS STRING)
        END
    CROSS JOIN 
        FileDate fd
    WHERE 
        le.Absence_Quota_Type = 'Annual Leave / P&P'
)

-- Step 4: Calculate carried-over hours
, CarriedOver AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        h.PersNo AS staff_number,
        CASE 
            WHEN le.Number - 148 >= 0 THEN 148
            ELSE le.Number
        END AS carried_over_hours
    FROM 
        odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR h
    LEFT JOIN 
        odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement le 
    ON 
        h.PersNo = CASE 
            WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.Staff_Number AS STRING), 1) = '4' THEN CONCAT('50', le.Staff_Number)
            WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.Staff_Number AS STRING), 1) = '5' THEN CONCAT('00', le.Staff_Number)
            ELSE CAST(le.Staff_Number AS STRING)
        END
    WHERE 
        le.Absence_Quota_Type = 'Brought Forward'
)

-- Step 5: Calculate leave taken
, LeaveTaken AS (
    SELECT
        h.PersNo AS staff_number,
        SUM(f.absence_hours) AS leave_hours_taken
    FROM 
        odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR h
    LEFT JOIN 
        odw_harmonised_db.fact_absence_all f 
    ON 
        h.PersNo = f.staff_number
    LEFT JOIN 
        StaffCost l 
    ON 
        f.staff_number = l.staff_number
    LEFT JOIN 
        CarriedOver co 
    ON 
        f.staff_number = co.staff_number
    WHERE 
        f.Attendance_or_Absence_Type IN ('PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave')
        AND f.absence_date BETWEEN l.leave_start_date AND fd.file_date
    GROUP BY 
        h.PersNo
)

-- Step 6: Insert data into the historical table
INSERT INTO Hist.SAP_HR
SELECT 
    h.PersNo,
    h.Firstname,
    h.Lastname,
    h.EmployeeNo,
    h.CoCd,
    h.CompanyCode,
    h.PA,
    h.PersonnelArea,
    h.PSubarea,
    h.PersonnelSubarea,
    h.Orgunit,
    h.OrganizationalUnit,
    h.Organizationalkey,
    h.OrganizationalKey1,
    h.WorkC,
    h.WorkContract,
    h.CT,
    h.ContractType,
    h.PSgroup,
    h.PayBandDescription,
    h.FTE,
    h.Wkhrs,
    h.IndicatorPartTimeEmployee,
    h.S,
    h.EmploymentStatus,
    h.GenderKey,
    h.TRAStart_Date,
    h.TRAEnd_Date,
    h.TRAStatus,
    h.TRAGrade,
    h.PrevPersNo,
    h.ActR,
    h.ReasonforAction,
    h.Position,
    h.Position1,
    h.CostCtr,
    h.CostCentre,
    h.CivilServiceStart,
    h.DatetoCurrent_Job,
    h.Seniority_Date,
    h.DatetoSubstGrade,
    h.PersNo1,
    h.NameofManagerOM,
    h.ManagerPosition,
    h.ManagerPositionText,
    h.CounterSignManager,
    h.Loc,
    h.Location,
    h.OrgStartDate,
    h.FixTermEndDate,
    h.LoanStartDate,
    h.LoanEndDate,
    h.EEGrp,
    h.EmployeeGroup,
    h.Annualsalary,
    h.Curr,
    h.NInumber,
    h.Birthdate,
    h.Ageofemployee,
    h.EO,
    h.Ethnic_origin,
    h.NID,
    h.Rel,
    h.ReligiousDenominationKey,
    h.SxO,
    h.WageType,
    h.EmployeeSubgroup,
    h.LOAAbsType,
    h.LOAAbsenceTypeText,
    h.Schemereference,
    h.PensionSchemeName,
    h.DisabilityCode,
    h.DisabilityText,
    h.DisabilityCodeDescription,
    h.PArea,
    h.PayrollArea,
    h.AssignmentNumber,
    h.FTE2,
    h.Report_MonthEnd_Date,
    COALESCE(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + COALESCE(co.carried_over_hours, 0) AS leave_entitlement_hrs,
    COALESCE(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0) AS leave_taken_hrs,
    ROUND((COALESCE(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + COALESCE(co.carried_over_hours, 0) - COALESCE(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 0) - COALESCE(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0)), 2) AS leave_remaining_hours,
    COALESCE(ROUND(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 2), 0) AS leave_remaining_prorata_hours
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR h
LEFT JOIN 
    StaffCost sc 
ON 
    h.PersNo = sc.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    CarriedOver co 
ON 
    sc.staff_number = co.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    LeaveTaken lt 
ON 
    sc.staff_number = lt.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    bis.pension_ernic_rates p 
ON 
    sc.grade = p.Grade
WHERE 
    RIGHT(CAST(Report_MonthEnd_Date AS STRING), 5) IN ('01-31', '02-28', '02-29', '03-31', '04-30', '05-31', '06-30', '07-31', '08-31', '09-30', '10-31', '11-30', '12-31');
